fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / cone of silence
fields.Description: EVERYTHING IS SILENT HERE VERY SPOOKY SCENE YES INDEED WHOLE SCENE ABOUT LOOKING UP AND THEN TIAGO APPEARS, BOOM!
fields.Placement:
Area: in the middle of the waterbowls
Details:

fields.Title: Tiago: "You see something hanging from the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see something hanging from the rafters, looking straight at you with dark eyes.

fields.Title: You: "(Blink.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: (Blink.)

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It's like you see your own face ref..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's like you see your own face reflected back at you in the vanishing geometry -- a strange, alien image that's supposed to be you.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "It's *climbing*. Climbing down, hol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's *climbing*. Climbing down, holding on the beams.

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe they wanted to discourage si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe they wanted to discourage singing and dancing."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Maybe if you were to stand in just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe if you were to stand in just the right spot, even your footsteps would be completely silent...
fields.Sequence: TravelTo(Tequila Sunset, ConeTeqPos); TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, ConeKimPos);FocusCamera(ConeStartCam);

fields.Title: You: "Wait, I think I still hear somethin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, I think I still hear something...

fields.Title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "What's happening?""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Turn to Kim.) "What's happening?"

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "It's not a shadow anymore -- becomi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not a shadow anymore -- becoming more substantial as it gets closer. The shape of an *animal* descends.

fields.Title: You: ""Can't hear shit.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can't hear shit."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please, detective, not this again.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please, detective, not this again."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It would likely be easier to explai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It would likely be easier to explain with a hands-on demonstration. Alas!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, is there something up the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, is there something up there?" The lieutenant follows your gaze, attempting to see whatever it is that you are seeing.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "And then it's gone. Almost all of i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And then it's gone. Almost all of it -- but for the faintest of hums.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You produce a few muffled thumps, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You produce a few muffled thumps, after which the silence feels even more... *total* somehow.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Yes. The darkness makes the ceiling..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. The darkness makes the ceiling feel infinitely far away...

fields.Title: Tiago: "Maybe it's possible to... talk to i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe it's possible to... talk to it?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wonder why the... church was bui..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wonder why the... church was built with such strange acoustics..."

fields.Title: Logic: "It seems that sound here is detache..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It seems that sound here is detached from its source somehow, if not blotted out outright. Truly unusual.

fields.Title: You: "Hmm, maybe I should take up paintin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hmm, maybe I should take up painting.

fields.Title: You: "Stomp your feet and clap your hands..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stomp your feet and clap your hands.

fields.Title: You: "Look up into the bell tower."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look up into the bell tower.

fields.Title: You: "Can I use this to see through the d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Can I use this to see through the darkness up there, somehow? (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "No, this is just an intellectual mu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, this is just an intellectual musing. In fact, it's probably dangerous to waste time like this. You should stop.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Revachol was an overwhelmingly colo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Revachol was an overwhelmingly colourful place back then. They made most of the world's dyes here.

fields.Title: You: "Look up into the bell tower."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look up into the bell tower.

fields.Title: You: "No. Let me just listen."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. Let me just listen.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You know, in the middle of the last..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know, in the middle of the last century, there was a group of Revacholian painters who famously disdained the use of black.

fields.Title: You: "Seems unfair to black. I like black..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seems unfair to black. I like black, look at it!

fields.Title: You: "Try to see beyond the shadows."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try to see beyond the shadows.

fields.Title: You: "How do I know what the pale sounds..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How do I know what the pale sounds like?

fields.Title: You: "Yell as loud as you can."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yell as loud as you can.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "The orderly rows of ceiling panels..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The orderly rows of ceiling panels become barely visible, then disappear completely in the darkness of the tower overhead.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Your voice is barely audible -- not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your voice is barely audible -- not a howl, but the softest of whimpers.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Filled with vague shapes of woodwor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Filled with vague shapes of woodwork. The sense of a great height.

fields.Title: You: ""It's probably nothing, just our im..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's probably nothing, just our imagination."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't reply, but y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant doesn't reply, but you can sense him tense up next to you.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Maybe the church was designed in th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe the church was designed in this way to prevent boisterous activity -- singing and dancing -- on its premises?

fields.Title: You: ""Whatever it is, it's definitely re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whatever it is, it's definitely real. Something odd is happening around us."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "He's trying to act dismissive, but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's trying to act dismissive, but at this particular moment, he's more open than usual to the idea of paranatural phenomena.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Sounds like the pale."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sounds like the pale.

fields.Title: Tiago: "You see something hanging from the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see something hanging from the rafters, looking straight at you with dark eyes.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "It's like there's something moving..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's like there's something moving up there -- a shadow has emerged from the tower and is making its way *toward* you through all the other shadows.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "There's nothing. You're dizzy and d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's nothing. You're dizzy and disoriented as you see dark and more dark -- rising...

fields.Title: Half Light: "It's unnerving."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's unnerving.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The church just has... strange aco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The church just has... strange acoustics -- some engineering trick."

fields.Title: You: "What's the darkness like?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's the darkness like?

fields.Title: You: ""Not really, but it's extraordinary..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not really, but it's extraordinary. I've never experienced anything like this."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "The silence in this part of the chu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The silence in this part of the church -- it's almost palpable. All the shifting matter and shuffling of living things is gone. Nothing seems to exist beyond the church anymore.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant points to his ears a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant points to his ears and shakes his head. Then he leans closer.

fields.Title: You: "On the ceiling?"
fields.Dialogue Text: On the ceiling?

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "The silence, the darkness -- they'v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The silence, the darkness -- they've enveloped you, as in a cocoon. You cannot move anymore.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You can hardly hear your own breath..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can hardly hear your own breathing.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "They wanted to capture what it real..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They wanted to capture what it really felt like to look at the world -- to be *inside* colour, to be blinded by early afternoon light glittering on the crests of sea waves.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Sometimes an encounter with an oppo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sometimes an encounter with an opposing aesthetic is required for one to truly grow into one's tastes and preferences.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Just darkness without end -- it mak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just darkness without end -- it makes your head spin.

fields.Title: You: "Try to make out something -- anythi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try to make out something -- anything.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Such an effect is best achieved by..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Such an effect is best achieved by using the juxtaposition of complementary colours -- rather than the addition of black -- to create contrast.

fields.Title: Volition: "Relax. It'll be okay."
fields.Dialogue Text: Relax. It'll be okay.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He doesn't seem entirely convinced,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't seem entirely convinced, though.

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, what if it's something *paran..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, what if it's something *paranatural*?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "Prepare for an attack!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Prepare for an attack!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, what are you looking at?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, what are you looking at?" He follows your gaze, attempting to see whatever it is that you are seeing.

fields.Title: Empathy: "His detached tone conceals how unco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His detached tone conceals how uncomfortable he is.

fields.Title: You: ""Almost nothing, and it's beginning..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Almost nothing, and it's beginning to worry me."

fields.Title: Tiago: "Maybe it's possible to... talk to i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe it's possible to... talk to it?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "From recordings. Of the far pale. Y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From recordings. Of the far pale. You've heard them. We all have.

fields.Title: You: "What did they have against black?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What did they have against black?

fields.Title: You: "(Blink.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: (Blink.)

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Oh no! You've lost sight of it. Whe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh no! You've lost sight of it. Where did it go?

fields.Title: You: "Follow the shadow's movements."
fields.Dialogue Text: Follow the shadow's movements.

fields.Title: You: "What if I don't *want* to know what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What if I don't *want* to know what's up there?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "But to what? There is almost nothin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But to what? There is almost nothing.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm, could be...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm, could be..."

fields.Title: You: "Why only Revacholian?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why only Revacholian?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It's unclear if you have enough yea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's unclear if you have enough years left in you to make up for your lack of technique...

fields.Title: You: "Sounds complicated."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sounds complicated.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Can you hear anything?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can you hear anything?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm, maybe. Darkness often has tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm, maybe. Darkness often has that effect on people."
